title: Right to Fair Hearing
description: Every individual is entitled to a fair and public hearing by an independent court within a reasonable time.

title: Freedom of Expression
description: All citizens have the right to express their opinions, provided it does not incite violence or break national laws.

title: Right to Privacy
description: No one should be subjected to unlawful interference with their privacy, family, home, or communication.

title: Protection from Discrimination
description: The law guarantees equal rights and protection for all individuals without discrimination

title: Right to Education
description: Every child has the right to free and compulsory basic education provided by the state.
